TAMALE REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER - 2025 ANNUAL REPORT

Surgical Department:
Performed 450 major surgeries including appendectomies, hernia repairs, cesarean sections. Our surgical team includes 8 general surgeons. Operating theater equipped with modern anesthesia machines and monitoring equipment.

Diagnostics:
X-ray available daily. Ultrasound machine (donated 2023, functional). Laboratory can perform CBC, malaria tests, basic chemistry. CT scanner installation planned for 2027.

Challenges:
Frequent power outages affect equipment reliability. Generator fuel costs strain budget. Staff shortage - currently no anesthesiologist on permanent staff, relying on visiting specialists twice monthly. This limits our surgical capacity significantly.

Emergency Department:
Operates 24/7 but limited to stabilization and referral for complex cases due to staffing constraints.
